text: 5.29: Mt 18.9 naŋga, Mk 9.47 naŋga, 1 Ko 9.27 naŋga, Kl 3.5Nandɨ tamɨŋga kuma kandɨ samba hambundu pɨŋgɨrɨvɨŋgɨrɨramɨti ñamba vana andɨtaŋgata, ivɨta kavara. Kamata tamɨŋgaŋgɨrɨsɨ tamu naŋgandaya kɨñɨ. Kamata ñamba vana maŋandɨrɨmana. Kamatɨna nandɨ kwɨrandɨmbat ha sɨhanaŋga Got ahutuvarandi helɨyɨ maŋgavarɨmandɨ. Ara tamɨŋgaŋgɨrɨsɨ timu maŋivɨta kavarata ñamba vana andɨrɨmana ha nandɨ kwɨrandɨmbat ha, sɨhanaŋga Got ahutuvarandi helɨyɨ kavarɨmandɨ.
